p: In addition to the aging immunity or ADE, there are several other factors related to aging that could be reasons for higher mortality and morbidity in the elderly. The average number of comorbid conditions steadily increased with age. According to Liu et al., elderly COVID-19 patients had a significantly higher performance score than young and middle-aged patients [ 34]. In addition, older adults living in long-term care facilities are at the highest risk because of their chronic illness and the impact of congregate housing [ 35].
